Summary: us 50 nevada lights become circle then become streak of light and then a flareout
trends: There has been one other sighting in Eureka
There were no other sightings in Eureka on or around October 1st 2011
divs: Sighting Details Travelling late at night Westbound on US 50 Ten or so miles East of Eureka, NV near Junction with highway 379. It was dark but I could see the mountian range directly ahead. To the right of the road was a set of Red and blue lights with the blue light about 5 feet of the ground, The red light was about 20 feet directly above it. The two lights began to spin on a vertical plane about a horizontal axis. From my vantage point in the car the two lights became a circle of lights about 20 -30 feet in diameter. The lights then just disapeared. Then seconds later from behind me and came directly over my car at a high altitude was a streak of light (Like a shooting star). The light went over the mountian ahead of me. From over the ridgeline light radiated out at the summit in rays of silver-gold glittery lights. About 5-6 rays and it looked like the crown of the statue of liberty. Within seconds it was all over. please do not contact me
